channel.title: Herald-Tribune (Custom RSS - Broad Article Grab)
channel.description: A personal RSS feed with broader article scraping from heraldtribune.com

item.title: 'Bachelor in Paradise' week 8: 3 of 4 Floridians dumped from the beach
item.description: The beach of ABC's"Bachelor in Paradise"is now three-fourths less Floridian.

item.title: Acclaimed Sarasota restaurant closing for good after ‘tough summer’
item.description: I love dishing out praise forSarasota and Manatee’s best restaurants— fromhidden gemstobuzzy new essentials— but today’s story is tougher: theclosingof an acclaimed fine-dining spot I’ve championed many times before.

item.title: Top 5 things to do in Sarasota-Manatee this weekend, Aug. 21-24
item.description: Don’t let the summer heat keep you from enjoying all the fun in Sarasota and Bradenton, witheventsstarting today and running through the weekend.

item.title: District 4A-11, 3A-11 Football Previews: Southeast, Bayshore, Booker
item.description: The Sarasota Herald-Tribune will get you ready for the 2025 high school football season. Here are previews for the teams competing in FHSAA Districts 4A-11 and 3A-11.

item.title: Out-of-Door Academy wins Preseason Top Football Team Poll
item.description: The Herald-Tribune recently ranked eight high school football teams to be the best in the Sarasota and Manatee County area entering the 2025 football season. Then we asked you, the readers, to vote for the high school football team you think is the best in the area heading into the new season.

item.title: High School Football: Week 1 Sarasota, Manatee game previews and predictions
item.description: Preview capsules and predictions for high school football games being played by Sarasota and Manatee County teams on Friday, Aug. 22, 2025

item.title: VOTE: Who would you pick to be No. 1 volleyball player…
item.description: TheSarasota Herald-Tribunerecently unveiled its The Fab 15 list of the Sarasota-Manatee counties' top players to watch entering the 2025 high school volleyball season. To see the full listCLICK HERE

item.title: HS ROUNDUP: Parrish girls golf wins dual match with ODA
item.description: A roundup of high school sports contests played the week of Aug. 18-23, 2025, in Manatee and Sarasota counties.

item.title: A farewell letter to Venice and Florida - and America…
item.description: We have just completed the sale of our Venice, Florida, property.

item.title: Parent says son labeled 'Naziphile' in Florida classroom
item.description: Florida's top K-12 education official said hefiled a complaint against a Gainesville teacher to get her teaching certificate revoked, a day after an area parent accused the woman of nominating a student "Most Likely to Become a Dictator."

item.title: With governments falling in line to DeSantis' DOGE…
item.description: Florida's local governments are falling in line with theunprecedented swoopfrom Tallahassee ofstate audit teamsexamining how tax dollars are being spent.

item.title: 'Cooling' Sarasota-Manatee real home sales continue downward trend
item.description: The Sarasota-Bradenton area's real estate market showed signs of stabilization in July, according to the most recentindustry report.

item.title: District 2A-9, Independent Football Previews: Cardinal Mooney, North Port
item.description: The Sarasota Herald-Tribune will get you ready for the 2025 high school football season. Here are previews for the teams competing in FHSAA District 2A-9 and Independent.

item.title: Sarasota County budget talks end with few cuts, $600K school bill
item.description: Despite tough talk from Sarasota County commissioners, this year’sfinal budget workshopended with little progress on curbing spending.

item.title: Will the historic Blackburn Point Road Swing Bridge be replaced?
item.description: OSPREY – For the second time in 25 years, Sarasota County is faced with the decision of whether to replace the historic Blackburn Point Road swing bridge.
